content: meet **octopus** one of the nine free **summer breeze amigurumi** characters taken straight away from my greek summers the pattern is easy to intermediate and takes no more than a couple of hours to make to make this cutie you ll practice * crocheting on the round increasing-decreasing * crocheting on a foundation chain * crocheting through the front or back loops only follow me @aminationblog to join the fun share your makes on instagram using #aminationsummer
